## getSeriesTimeStep variable

### getSeriesTimeStep variable

Returns minimal time step from series time field

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
getSeriesTimeStep: (timeField: Field<any, import("..").Vector<any>>) => number | undefined
```
<b>Import</b>

